cu.explanation_en: Setting the gNB_ID to an invalid hexadecimal format '0xinvalid' will cause parsing errors during configuration loading and prevent the CU from initializing properly.

du.explanation_en: Setting the number of transmit antennas to 0 will cause radio unit configuration failure and prevent proper signal transmission.
du.explanation_zh: 將發射天線數量設定為 0 會導致無線電單元配置失敗，並阻止正確的信號傳輸。
